FuncDef:
The display udp statistics command displays UDP packet statistics.
The display udp ipv6 statistics command displays IPv6 UDP packet statistics. The display udp statistics command displays UDP packet statistics. The display udp ipv6 statistics command displays IPv6 UDP packet statistics.
ExtraInfo: UDP is a communications protocol used for packet exchanging on the Internet. It uses the simplest transmission model to send messages from one user application to another. To view IPv6 UDP packet statistics, run the display udp ipv6 statistics command. The following information will be displayed:
